title: Bad 3-Point Shooting, Best Guard Combos
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim Bontemps and Tim MacMahon to discuss a historically bad 3-point shooting performance from the Celtics, what moves Boston can make, Desmond Bane’s potential in Memphis and the best guard combinations in the NBA.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Who Are The Best Guard Combos In The NBA? Worst 3-Point Shooting Percentage
